HeyWake
//Man hinh walkthrought NEXT IGNORE
Welcome! Welcome to a completely \ndifferent day The news is always updated Hey Wake ≡ "Honey" Let\'s start We know that winter is very cold ... but do not sleep so late! Not just one click, you will be convinced to wake up with unique games. The latest daily news and the most comprehensive aggregation will be brought to you Do not need "honey" to remind you to go to sleep, Hey Wake will be a friend always ready to remind you to go to bed every night And now, let\'s start with Hey Wake to has more interesting expearence! HomeActivity Settings Hello World from section: %1$d
Bạn chưa có báo thức nào\n Thêm báo thức nào!
Guide to turn off the alarm Default Repeat No Vibrate when alarm Label Ringtone Default CANCEL OK
Add alarm AlarmDetailsActivity Save
Settings Sleep hour Event Introduction Reset Experts\' research indicates that we need at least seven hours of sleep a night to keep our bodies awake. Depending on the circumstances, the environment of each person to calculates the sleep time for himself or herself. In particular, sleep should start before 11PM.
